name: Spicy Frontier
description: A bold, spicy take on the Red Frontier with chili-infused rum and warm spices. A fiery cocktail for the adventurous.
flavorProfile: Hot, rich and spiced with warmth from chili and cinnamon, balanced by fruity cranberry.
instructions: Strain over crushed ice into a tumbler.
Garnish with a red chili slice.
